meanings.definition: A small jumping insect that makes a chirping sound.
meanings.sent1: I heard crickets chirping in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The crickets in the field were making a lovely melody.
meanings.sent3: When I told a joke, all I got was crickets in response.
meanings.sent4: The night was so quiet, it felt like the crickets were the only ones talking.
meanings.sent5: The sound of crickets at night always helps me fall asleep.

meanings.definition: Complete silence or lack of response.
meanings.sent1: After the announcement, there were crickets in the room.
meanings.sent2: When I asked for volunteers, I was met with crickets.
meanings.sent3: During the awkward pause, all I could hear was crickets.
meanings.sent4: The lack of applause left me feeling like I was performing to crickets.
meanings.sent5: The crickets in the audience made me realize my speech was not engaging.
